SELECT left(a.stat_time,8) as stat_time, sum(a.success_count) as success_count, sum(a.total_count) as total_count, floor(sum(a.success_money)) as success_money, sum(a.total_money) as total_money, a.product_id, a.region, concat(d.server_name,'-',a.server) as server, a.inviter, b.product_name, concat(c.username, '[', c.uuid, ']') as inviter_name, c.level FROM item_stat as a left join product as b on a.product_id = b.product_id left join partner as c on a.inviter=c.uuid left join product_server as d on a.server=d.product_server_id
GROUP BY
${groupBy}
left(stat_time,8)
ORDER BY
${orderBy}
left(stat_time,8) desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT c.username AS inviter_name, SUM(b.`success_money`) AS success_money, SUM(b.total_money) AS total_money, SUM(b.total_count) AS total_count, SUM(b.success_count) AS success_count, c.`username` FROM item_stat b LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM childrenlst WHERE LEVEL=2) AS a ON INSTR(CONCAT(',',a.childrenlst,','),CONCAT(',',b.inviter,','))>0 LEFT JOIN partner c ON a.uuid=c.`uuid` WHERE b.stat_time>=CONCAT(REPLACE(#{beginTime},"-",""),"00")
AND b.stat_time <= concat(replace(#{endTime},"-",""),"24")
AND c.username= #{username}
GROUP BY a.childrenlst ) AS a
